languages.text: "Он осмелился высмеять то, как вы якобы пытались {d|Encyclopedia:NemesiteExploitsSmartWay}настроить{/d} против него простолюдинов литейного отсека... подкупить их. Каков подлец!"
"He dared to ridicule the way you allegedly tried to {d|Encyclopedia:NemesiteExploitsSmartWay}turn{/d} the commoners of the foundry bay against him... with a bribe. What a despicable character!"
languages.original_text: "Он осмелился высмеять то, как вы якобы пытались {d|Encyclopedia:NemesiteExploitsSmartWay}настроить{/d} против него простолюдинов литейного отсека... подкупить их. Каков подлец!"

traits.locale_text: "He dared to ridicule the way you allegedly tried to turn the commoners of the foundry bay against him… with a bribe. What a despicable character!"
"He dared to ridicule the way you allegedly tried to turn the commoners of the foundry bay against him… with a bribe. What a despicable character!"
"He dared to ridicule the way you allegedly tried to turn the commoners of the foundry bay against him… with a bribe. What a despicable character!"
"He dared to ridicule the way you allegedly tried to turn the commoners of the foundry bay against him… with a bribe. What a despicable character!"
"He dared to ridicule the way you allegedly tried to {d|Encyclopedia:NemesiteExploitsSmartWay}turn{/d} the commoners of the foundry bay against him... with a bribe. What a despicable character!"

languages.text: "Er hat verhöhnt, dass Ihr angeblich versucht habt, die Leute der Gießereibucht gegen ihn aufzuwiegeln ... durch Bestechung. Was für ein verachtenswerter Geselle!"
languages.original_text: "He dared to ridicule the way you allegedly tried to turn the commoners of the foundry bay against him... with a bribe. What a despicable character!"

traits.locale_text: "Er hat verhöhnt, dass Ihr angeblich versucht habt, die Leute der Gießereibucht gegen ihn aufzuwiegeln ... durch Bestechung. Was für ein verachtenswerter Geselle!"

languages.text: «Osó ridiculizar el modo en que supuestamente intentó poner en su contra a los plebeyos de la fundición... con un soborno. ¡Qué individuo más despreciable!».
languages.original_text: "He dared to ridicule the way you allegedly tried to turn the commoners of the foundry bay against him... with a bribe. What a despicable character!"

traits.locale_text: «Osó ridiculizar el modo en que supuestamente intentó poner en su contra a los plebeyos de la fundición... con un soborno. ¡Qué individuo más despreciable!».

languages.text: 「奴は、あなたが鋳造ベイの平民を賄賂で奴の{d|Encyclopedia:NemesiteExploitsSmartWay}敵に回そうとした{/d}やり口を、あえて笑い話にしました。なんて卑劣な人間だ！」
languages.original_text: "He dared to ridicule the way you allegedly tried to {d|Encyclopedia:NemesiteExploitsSmartWay}turn{/d} the commoners of the foundry bay against him... with a bribe. What a despicable character!"

traits.locale_text: 「奴は、あなたが鋳造ベイの平民を賄賂で奴の敵に回そうとしたやり口を、あえて笑い話にしました。なんて卑劣な人間だ！」

languages.text: “他竟敢嘲笑您，说您是靠……贿赂，才说服铸造甲板的民众反对他。这是何等卑劣！”
languages.original_text: "He dared to ridicule the way you allegedly tried to turn the commoners of the foundry bay against him... with a bribe. What a despicable character!"

traits.locale_text: “他竟敢嘲笑您，说您是靠……贿赂，才说服铸造甲板的民众反对他。这是何等卑劣！”

languages.text: « Cette ordure a osé tourner en ridicule la façon dont vous auriez tenté de lui aliéner les ouvriers de la fonderie... en leur graissant la patte. »
languages.original_text: "He dared to ridicule the way you allegedly tried to turn the commoners of the foundry bay against him... with a bribe. What a despicable character!"

traits.locale_text: « Cette ordure a osé tourner en ridicule la façon dont vous auriez tenté de lui aliéner les ouvriers de la fonderie... en leur graissant la patte. »
